u_forced_leave_lobby: You were forced to leave the lobby.
cant_start_it_alone: You can not start it alone !
cant_start_without_opponents: You can not start without opponents !

ui.desc_deathmatch_arena: Join the thrill of intense deathmatch matches! Plan your strategy, work with your team, and dominate the arena.
ui.desc_blue_team: The Blue Team stands united, ready for action in the deathmatch arena. Known for their camaraderie and determination, they bring a sense of unity to every match.
ui.desc_red_team: The Red Team is full of spirit and enthusiasm, always eager for a challenge. With their bold colors and competitive nature, they add excitement to every game.
